text:
Amy Joanne Robach (born February 6, 1973) is a television presenter for ABC News. She is the co-anchor of "20" and the breaking news anchor/fill-in anchor for "Good Morning America".
She was a national correspondent for NBC News, co-host of the Saturday edition of NBC's "Today", and anchor on MSNBC.
Since May 2018, she has been the co-anchor of "20" alongside David Muir.
